statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

article.description: Wiggins, Coastal Carolina come back, beat Campbell
article.headline: Wiggins, Coastal Carolina come back, beat Campbell
article.linkText: Wiggins, Coastal Carolina come back, beat Campbell
article.story: BUIES CREEK, N.C. -- Shivaughn Wiggins scored a career-high 22 on Monday night and Coastal Carolina won its sixth-straight game, topping Campbell 70-67. Josh Cameron added 16 points and Warren Gillis scored 15 for the Chanticleers (14-3, 5-0 Big South), who made 24 of 45 (53.3 percent) field goals and overcame a 14-point first-half deficit. A 3 by Campbell's Andrew Ryan tied the game at 58 with five minutes left, but a 10-4 run by Coastal Carolina made it 68-62 with 55 seconds remaining. D.J. Mason hit a 3-pointer to pull Campbell within three and, after two free throws by Gillis, Kyre' Hamer's layup with 15 seconds to go made it 70-67. Coastal Carolina's Elijah Wilson missed the front end of a one-and-one, but Ryan missed a potential tying 3 in the waning seconds. Hamer and Mason scored 16 apiece for Campbell (7-10, 1-3), which shot just 36 percent but made 12 3-pointers and converted 16 offensive rebounds into 14 second-chance points.
